verses.name: Galatians 5:12
verses.text: I would they were even cut off which trouble you.

verses.name: Galatians 5:13
verses.text: For, brethren, ye have been called unto liberty; only use not liberty for an occasion to the flesh, but by love serve one another.

verses.name: Galatians 5:14
verses.text: For all the law is fulfilled in one word, even in this; Thou shalt love thy neighbour as thyself.

verses.name: Galatians 5:15
verses.text: But if ye bite and devour one another, take heed that ye be not consumed one of another.

verses.name: Galatians 5:16
verses.text: This I say then, Walk in the Spirit, and ye shall not fulfil the lust of the flesh.
